welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Linganore, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this lovely town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a range of amenities and services for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security, and departure gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
